transcript.title: NATIONAL ANTHEM
transcript.content:
/ i
8 April 1974
NATIONAL ANTHEM
Please find attached copies of the results of the
National Anthem poll which the Prime Minister, Mr. Whitlam,
incorporated in Hansard this morning.
